00026 // lbann_optimizer_rmsprop .hpp .cpp - Stochastic gradient descent optimizer with RMSprop
00027 //
00034 
00035 #ifndef LBANN_OPTIMIZER_RMSPROP_HPP
00036 #define LBANN_OPTIMIZER_RMSPROP_HPP
00037 
00038 #include "lbann/optimizers/lbann_optimizer.hpp"
00039 #include <sys/stat.h>
00040 
00041 namespace lbann
00042 {
00043   template <class _DistMat>
00044   class RMSprop : public Optimizer {
00045 
00046   public:
00047     float LearnRate;
00048     //    float lr;
00049     float rho;
00050     float epsilon;
00051 
00052     lbann_comm* comm;
00053     _DistMat     WB_D_Cache;     // Cache of Weights and Bias Gradient (current time t - 1)
00054     _DistMat     WB_D_Temp;      // Temporary for Weights and Bias Gradient computation
00055     _DistMat     WB_D_Temp2;     // Temporary for Weights and Bias Gradient computation
00056 
00057   private:
00058     static inline DataType _sq(DataType x) { return (x * x); }
00059     static inline DataType _sqrt(DataType x) { return (1 / sqrt(x + 1e-8)); }
00060 
00061   public:
00062     RMSprop(lbann_comm* comm, float lr, float rho, float epsilon)
00063       : LearnRate(lr), rho(rho), epsilon(epsilon), comm(comm),
00064         WB_D_Cache(comm->get_model_grid()),
00065         WB_D_Temp(comm->get_model_grid()),
00066         WB_D_Temp2(comm->get_model_grid()) {
00067       if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00068         printf("Initializing RMSprop optimizer with lr=%f, rho=%f, and epsilon=%f\n", lr, rho, epsilon);
00069       }
00070     }
00071 
00072     ~RMSprop() {
00073       WB_D_Cache.Empty();
00074       WB_D_Temp.Empty();
00075       WB_D_Temp2.Empty();
00076     }
00077 
00078     void setup(int input_dim, int num_neurons) {
00079       if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00080         printf("Setting up RMSprop optimizer with cache size %d x %d\n", num_neurons, input_dim);
00081       }
00082       Zeros(WB_D_Cache, num_neurons, input_dim);
00083       Zeros(WB_D_Temp, num_neurons, input_dim);
00084       Zeros(WB_D_Temp2, num_neurons, input_dim);  
00085       if (comm->am_model_master()) {
00086         printf("Setting up RMSprop optimizer with WB_D_Cache size %d x %d\n", WB_D_Cache.Height(), WB_D_Cache.Width());  
00087       }
00088     }
00089 
00090     void update_weight_bias_matrix(ElMat &WB_D, ElMat& WB) {
00091       // update accumulator
00092       // KERAS: for p, g, a, c in zip(params, grads, accumulators, constraints):
00093       // KERAS: new_a = self.rho * a + (1 - self.rho) * K.square(g)
00094       Scale(rho /*DecayRate*/, WB_D_Cache);
00095       Copy(WB_D, WB_D_Temp);
00096       EntrywiseMap(WB_D_Temp, std::function<DataType(DataType)>(_sq));
00097       Scale(1 - rho /*DecayRate*/, WB_D_Temp);
00098       Axpy(1., WB_D_Temp, WB_D_Cache);
00099 
00100       // update parameters
00101       // KERAS: new_p = p - self.lr * g / K.sqrt(new_a + self.epsilon)
00102       Copy(WB_D_Cache, WB_D_Temp);
00103       EntrywiseMap(WB_D_Temp, std::function<DataType(DataType)>(_sqrt));
00104       Copy(WB_D, WB_D_Temp2);
00105       Hadamard(WB_D_Temp2, WB_D_Temp, WB_D);
00106 
00107       //    WBL2NormSum = 0.0;
00108       Axpy((DataType)-LearnRate, WB_D, WB);
00109     }
00110 
00111     float get_learning_rate() const { return LearnRate; }
00112     void set_learning_rate(float _lr) { LearnRate = _lr; }
00113 
00114     bool saveToCheckpoint(int fd, const char* filename, uint64_t* bytes) {
00115       //    writeDist(fd, filename, WB_D_Cache, bytes);
00116       return true;
00117     }
00118 
00119     bool loadFromCheckpoint(int fd, const char* filename, uint64_t* bytes) {
00120       //    readDist(fd, filename, WB_D_Cache, bytes);
00121       return true;
00122     }
00123 
00124     bool saveToCheckpointShared(const char* dir, int Index, uint64_t* bytes) {
00125       int rank = WB_D_Cache.Grid().Rank();
00126 
00127       char path[512];
00128       sprintf(path, "%s/WB_D_CACHE_L%d_%03dx%03d", dir, Index, WB_D_Cache.Height()-1, WB_D_Cache.Width()-1);
00129       if(rank == 0) {
00130         cout << "Saving layer " << Index << " to file " << path << endl;
00131       }
00132       Write(WB_D_Cache, path, BINARY, "");
00133       //Write_MPI(WB_D_Cache, path, BINARY, "");
00134 
00135       if (rank == 0) {
00136         *bytes += 2 * sizeof(int) + WB_D_Cache.Height() * WB_D_Cache.Width() * sizeof(DataType);
00137       }
00138 
00139       return true;
00140     }
00141 
00142     bool loadFromCheckpointShared(const char* dir, int Index, uint64_t* bytes) {
00143       int rank = WB_D_Cache.Grid().Rank();
00144 
00145       char path[512];
00146       struct stat buffer;
00147 
00148       // read in the cache of gradients for WB
00149       sprintf(path, "%s/WB_D_CACHE_L%d_%03dx%03d.bin", dir, Index, WB_D_Cache.Height()-1, WB_D_Cache.Width()-1);
00150 
00151       // check whether file exists
00152       int exists = 0;
00153       if (rank == 0 && stat(path, &buffer) == 0) {
00154         exists = 1;
00155       }
00156       MPI_Bcast(&exists, 1, MPI_INT, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD);
00157 
00158       // read WB_D_Cache file
00159       if (rank == 0) {
00160         cout << "Restoring layer " << Index << " from file " << path << endl;
00161       }
00162       Read(WB_D_Cache, path, BINARY, 1);
00163       //Read_MPI(WB_D_Cache, path, BINARY, 1);
00164 
00165       if (rank == 0) {
00166         *bytes += 2 * sizeof(int) + WB_D_Cache.Height() * WB_D_Cache.Width() * sizeof(DataType);
00167       }
00168       return true;
00169     }
00170     
00171   };
00172 
00173   class RMSprop_factory : public Optimizer_factory {
00174   public:
00175     // Default values from Keras - it is recommended that they are left at their default values
00176     RMSprop_factory(lbann_comm* comm, float lr=0.001, float rho=0.9, float epsilon=1e-6);
00177     ~RMSprop_factory();
00178     Optimizer *create_optimizer(matrix_format format=matrix_format::MC_MR);
00179 
00180   public:
00181     //    float LearnRate;
00182     lbann_comm* comm;
00183     float lr;
00184     float rho;
00185     float epsilon;
00186   };
00187 
00188 }

00190 #endif // LBANN_OPTIMIZER_RMSPROP_HPP
